title: Tehri
desc: In a sweet and sour tiff between mother-son, projecting the disappointments that both have against each other. The mother worries that her son is jobless and disregards her son fussing about the food not being served.

title: Hum Do Hamare Do
desc: Both the brothers fight over the volume of the television. Aman requests his mother to convince Annu to make his drawing for his practical exam, starting another argument.

title: Itwaar
desc: On a not so good early Sunday morning, Annu's mother wakes up to the alarm ringing. With the arrival of Sunday, most middle class families plan to make it special. How special would be the Sunday of Mishra family?

title: Batti Aa Gayi
desc: Aman enquires about Annu who hasn't returned home late. Annu's father is relaxed while awaiting him. Annu returns to only demand for a scooty, making up excuses for being late.

title: Tyohaar
desc: It's Raksha Bandhan, Shanti falls sick yet has to work all day. Annu shares his exam results with Aman, so he suggests him to run away. Shanti falls unconscious on hearing upon Annu's exam results.

title: Bijlee Ka Bill
desc: Mishra house has received an inflated electricity bill. While a lot of speculation goes into how the bill has exceeded all limits, it is revealed that this problem has struck other households in the colony as well. This lands a great opportunity for Santosh Mishra to make some extra bucks and fulfill a few small dreams of the family.

title: Cheeni Kam, Paani Zyaada
desc: Shanti Mishra is dragged to a free medical camp and is diagnosed with diabetes. There is a kitty party round the corner and she is in no mood to cancel the same. Mishraji realizes it and says that the boys will do the preparation.

title: Saparivaar
desc: Annu is summoned to Pinky Mama's house as his daughter Raanu is getting married. The entire family gets excited and starts preparing. But the excitement disappears soon when the wedding card arrives and doesn't mention 'Saparivaar'.

title: Kal Board ka Paper hai
desc: It's board exams of Aman Mishra tomorrow and today is match between India and Pakistan at night and everyone is excited to watch it but there are other plans for Aman.

title: Kiraana
desc: D day for Mishra family. Today is the day Annu is supposed to get his gas agency license and Aman gets his board results. A big day for them both.
